title: Schedule Concrete Pour and Testing
description: A site manager needs to schedule a concrete pour for the building's foundation and coordinate the required third-party slump test.

tasks.description: Contact the concrete supplier to schedule a delivery of 50 cubic yards for a specific date and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: A concrete delivery is successfully scheduled.

tasks.description: Contact the third-party testing agency to schedule a technician to be on-site to perform slump tests during the pour.
tasks.expected_outcome: A testing technician is successfully booked for the same date and time.
